item.title: Becoming a Successful Swallow Entrepreneur: Calculating Capital, Profit, and Taxes Accurately!
item.dc:creator: raulilma
item.description:
Starting a business in the swiftlet bird industry can be a promising choice due to its potential for high profits. Swiftlet bird nests are one of the commodities that have a high selling price and continue to increase every year. It’s no wonder that this business is becoming more and more popular. Becoming a Successful Swallow Entrepreneur: Calculating Capital, Profit, and Taxes Accurately! Read More »
item.content:encoded:
Starting a business in the swiftlet bird industry can be a promising choice due to its potential for high profits. Swiftlet bird nests are one of the commodities that have a high selling price and continue to increase every year. It’s no wonder that this business is becoming more and more popular. In addition, the demand for swiftlet bird nests from both domestic and foreign markets continues to increase, opening up opportunities to develop businesses on a larger scale. Besides gaining profits from the sale of swiftlet bird nests, this business can also provide added value in the form of job opportunities for the surrounding community. However, before starting this business, it is important to know the required capital, expected profits, and taxes that need to be paid.

Swiftlet Bird Business Capital

The initial capital required to start a swiftlet bird business is quite large because it requires a special place for the swiftlet bird nests. The price of building a swiftlet bird house ranges from IDR 20 million to IDR 50 million, depending on the location and size of the swiftlet bird house being built. In addition, there are also other costs such as feed, care, and nest management that must be incurred. The total capital required to start a swiftlet bird business ranges from IDR 50 million to IDR 100 million.

Swiftlet Bird Business Profits

The swiftlet bird business promises significant profits. Based on research, each swiftlet bird can produce one ounce of swiftlet bird nests per year. The price of swiftlet bird nests per ounce varies depending on the quality and sales location. On average, the price of swiftlet bird nests per ounce ranges from IDR 20 million to IDR 30 million. Therefore, the profit that can be obtained from one swiftlet bird per year ranges from IDR 20 million to IDR 30 million. The amount of profit that can be obtained will certainly be greater if there are more swiftlet birds in the swiftlet bird house.

Swiftlet Bird Nest Taxes

Swiftlet bird nest taxes are taxes that must be paid every month based on the sales turnover of swiftlet bird nests. This tax is imposed by the government as part of state revenue. The amount of swiftlet bird nest taxes varies depending on the size of the sales turnover. This tax can reach 10% to 30% of sales turnover. Therefore, it is very important to manage the swiftlet bird business well and systematically so that the taxes that need to be paid can be controlled.

Conclusion

That’s the information about the swiftlet bird business, starting from the required capital, expected profits, and swiftlet bird nest taxes that need to be paid. As a swiftlet bird business player, it is important to have sufficient knowledge and skills in managing the business to succeed and gain maximum profits.

item.title: Here is the Latest Price List of Swiftlet Bird’s Nest Per Ounce and Per Kilogram from a Trusted Source!

Here is the Latest Price List of Swiftlet Bird’s Nest Per Ounce and Per Kilogram from a Trusted Source! Read More »
item.content:encoded:
Edible birdnests are one of the commodities that attract the attention of society due to their high market value. This is because of the high demand from domestic and international markets, as well as the difficulty in harvesting them, which requires special techniques and comes with high risks. Edible birdnests are believed to contain high nutritional value and are believed to have health benefits for humans, which is why many people are interested in consuming or trading them.

The price of edible birdnests is quite high, so it is not surprising that many people are interested in finding information about their prices. However, one of the problems that often arises is the lack of information about the price of edible birdnests. How much does one ons or one kilogram of edible birdnest cost? The price of edible birdnests can vary depending on several factors, such as the quality of the nest, the origin of the nest, and also the market conditions at the time.

According to some sources, the price of edible birdnests can reach millions of rupiahs per kilogram. The price varies depending on the quality and origin of the nest. Edible birdnests from Indonesia are usually cheaper than those from countries such as Thailand or Malaysia. The price of edible birdnests can also differ depending on the market conditions at the time. Based on information obtained from the e-commerce site Bukalapak, the price of edible birdnests in Indonesia currently ranges from IDR 20 million to IDR 25 million per kilogram. However, the price can vary depending on the quality, size, and origin of the edible birdnest. Meanwhile, according to the news site Tribunnews, the price of edible birdnests in the world market can reach USD 3,000 to USD 6,000 per kilogram.

As for the price of edible birdnests per ons, according to some sources, the price can range from tens of thousands to hundreds of thousands of rupiahs. Based on information from the Alibaba website, the price of edible birdnests per ons varies from USD 50 (IDR 763,400.00) to USD 600 (IDR 9,160,800.00), depending on the quality and size of the nest.

However, the price of edible birdnests is indeed very high. Therefore, before buying edible birdnests, it is important to do research and choose high-quality nests at a reasonable price. It is also important to buy edible birdnests from trustworthy sellers with a good reputation in the market. That way, you can ensure that you get high-quality edible birdnests at a fair price.

Overall, the price of edible birdnests can vary greatly depending on several factors such as the quality and origin of the nest. Despite their high price, edible birdnests are still a commodity that is in high demand due to their high nutritional value and health benefits. Therefore, it is important to do research and buy edible birdnests from trustworthy sellers to get high-quality nests at a reasonable price.
